segments.text: Looking at this drawing, I notice the sink is completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading down onto the floor, making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just polishing her plate, oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water splashing?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, these kids are up to no good with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that shaky stool, reaching in like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it'll be a disaster on top of the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting eagerly, hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets make it look so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the parent isn't watching them closer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's a hazard zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to turn off that faucet before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
